header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.description: A name for the server

header.name: transfer-encoding

body.raw:

    /**
     * 发送业务验证码类型
     * USER_REGISTER_PHONE :USER_REGISTER_PHONE
     * USER_LOGIN_PHONE :USER_LOGIN_PHONE
     * USER_REGISTER_EMAIl :USER_REGISTER_EMAIl
     * USER_LOGIN_EMAIl :USER_LOGIN_EMAIl
     */
    "type": "",
    "captcha": "",
    "captchaId": "",
    "to": "" //接收方，邮箱或手机号
}
